Reference

All functions

Min() Max() Sum() Mean() Median()

Computations with NA values removed

Start() Middle() End()

Start, middle, and end extrators

arrange(<epi_df>) group_by(<epi_df>) group_modify(<epi_df>) mutate(<epi_df>) ungroup(<epi_df>) unnest(<epi_df>)

dplyr verbs

as_epi_df()

Convert to epi_df format

as_tsibble(<epi_df>)

Convert to tsibble object

epi_cor()

Compute lagged correlations between variables in an epi_df object

epi_detect_outlr()

Detect outliers in a variable in an epi_df object

epi_detect_outlr_rm()

Detect outliers based on a rolling median

epi_detect_outlr_stl()

Detect outliers based on an STL decomposition

epi_df

epi_df object

epi_slide()

Slide a function over variables in an epi_df object

epiprocess

epiprocess: Tools for basic signal processing in epidemiology

estimate_deriv()

Estimate derivative

pct_change()

Compute percentage change

print(<epi_df>)

Print epi_df object

summary(<epi_df>)

Summarize epi_df object
